tit.cmt: 「Hachijonomiya Imperial Prince Naohito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Hachijo-no-miya Naohito』に変更しました。他の親王英語表記と統一させるためです。

sen.j: 八条宮尚仁親王（はちじょうのみや なおひとしんのう、寛文11年11月9日 (旧暦)（1671年12月10日） - 元禄2年8月6日 (旧暦)（1689年9月19日））は江戸時代前期の皇族。
sen.e: Hachijonomiya Imperial Prince Naohito (December 10, 1671 – September 19, 1689) was a member of the Imperial family in the early Edo period.
Imperial Prince Hachijo-no-miya Naohito (December 10, 1671 – September 19, 1689) was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: ・「Hachijonomiya Imperial Prince Naohito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Hachijo-no-miya Naohito』に変更しました。・「the Imperial family in the Edo period」 ⇒ 『the Imperial family who lived in the Edo period』に修正しました。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Hachijo-no-miya Naohito (December 10, 1671 – September 19, 1689) was a member of the Imperial family who lived in the early Edo period.
He was the fifth family head of Hachijo no Miya (also known as Katsura no Miya) family.
He was the fifth family head of Hachijo-no-miya (also known as Katsura-no-miya) family.
sen.cmt: 下記のように変更しました。・「Hachijo no Miya」 ⇒ 『Hachijo-no-miya』・「Katsura no Miya」 ⇒ 『Katsura-no-miya』
sen.e: He was the fifth family head of Hachijo-no-miya (also known as Katsura-no-miya) family.
He was the eighth imperial prince of the Emperor Gosai.
He was the eighth son of the Emperor Gosai.
sen.cmt: 「the eighth imperial prince」 ⇒ 『the eighth son』に変更しました。
sen.e: He was the eighth son of the Emperor Gosai.

sen.j: 母は、僧智秀の娘・六条局藤原定子。
sen.e: His mother was Rokujo-no-tsubobe FUJIWARA no Teishi, a daughter of Chishu, a Buddhist priest.
His mother was Rokujo-no-tsubobe FUJIWARA no Teishi, a daughter of Chishu, a Buddhist priest.
His mother was Rokujo-no-tsubobe FUJIWARA no Teishi, a daughter of Chishu, a Buddhist priest.

sen.j: 幼称は員宮（かねのみや）。
sen.e: He was called Kanenomiya when young.
He was called Kanenomiya when young.
He was called Kanenomiya when young.

sen.j: 延宝3年（1675年）長仁親王の遺言により、八条宮家の継嗣となる。
sen.e: In 1675, he became the heir of the Hachijonomiya Family according to the will of the Imperial Prince Nagahito.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 1675, he became the heir of the Hachijo-no-miya Family according to the will of Imperial Prince Nagahito.
sen.cmt: ・「the Hachijonomiya Family」 ⇒ 『the Hachijo-no-miya Family』に変更しました。・「the Imperial Prince Nagahito」 ⇒ 『Imperial Prince Nagahito』に修正しました。
sen.e: In 1675, he became the heir of the Hachijo-no-miya Family according to the will of Imperial Prince Nagahito.

sen.j: 貞享元年（1684年）11月親王宣下を受け、尚仁と命名される。
sen.e: In November 1684, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and was named Naohito.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 1684, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and was named Naohito.
sen.cmt: ・「In November 1684」 ⇒ 『In 1684』に変更しました。理由は、原文に記載和文を考慮すると、西暦1684年の11月が貞享元年11月と一致しているかは不明なので『November (=11月)』は、省きました。
sen.e: In December 1684, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and was named Naohito.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴の12月を入力しました。

sen.j: 貞享3年（1686年）3月元服し、弾正台に任ぜられる。
sen.e: In March 1686, he celebrated his coming of age and was designated as a danjodai (Board of Censors).
In 1686, he celebrated his coming of age and was designated as a Danjodai (Board of Censors).
sen.cmt: ・「In March 1686」 ⇒ 『In 1686』に変更しました。理由は上記と同じです。・「danjodai」 ⇒ 『Danjodai』に変更しました。
sen.e: In March 1686, he celebrated his coming of age and was designated as a Danjodai (Board of Censors).
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴の3月を入力しました。

sen.e: He passed away on September 19, 1689.
He passed away on September 19, 1689.
He passed away on September 19, 1689.
He died at the age of 19.
He died at the age of 19.
He died at the age of 19.
His homyo (a posthumous Buddhist name) was Muryoko-in.
His homyo (a posthumous Buddhist name) was Muryoko-in.
His homyo (a posthumous Buddhist name) was Muryoko-in.
